**2022-03-23 / @rsc, @griesemer, @bradfitz, @spf13**

**Accepted**

- **cmd/go: add 'unix' build tag but not \*\_unix.go file support** [#51572](https://golang.org/issue/51572)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **cmd/go: stamp the pseudo-version in builds generated by \`go build\`** [#50603](https://golang.org/issue/50603)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **cmd/vet: enable fuzz checks in 'tests' analysis pass** [#46218](https://golang.org/issue/46218)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **go/doc: improve headings, lists, and links** [#51082](https://golang.org/issue/51082)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **sort: add Find** [#50340](https://golang.org/issue/50340)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **time: add Duration.Abs** [#51414](https://golang.org/issue/51414)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **compress/gzip: add compressing reader and decompressing writer** [#51092](https://golang.org/issue/51092)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **runtime/pprof: add SetMaxDumpGoroutine to limit the number of goroutines dumped in a profile** [#50794](https://golang.org/issue/50794)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
